doc:
Lesley Fera https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lesley_Fera 0 Lesley Fera (born November 23, 1971) is an American actress. She is best known for her role as Veronica Hastings on the ABC Family series Pretty Little Liars. Fera also had a recurring roles in 24, CSI: Miami and Southland, as well as performing in a number of theater productions. Lesley_Fera ( born November_23 , 1971 ) is an_American_actress . She is_best_known for her_role as Veronica_Hastings on the_ABC_Family_series_Pretty_Little_Liars . Fera also had a_recurring_roles in 24 , CSI : Miami_and_Southland , as_well_as performing in a_number of theater_productions .
